    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    ApplicationRepository
    In-memory repository for managing InternshipApplication entities.
    ApplicationStatus
    Represents the possible statuses of an application throughout its lifecycle.
    AuthController
    Authentication controller responsible for validating login credentials and managing in-memory password store used by the demo application.
    AuthController.Role
    Roles understood by the authentication system.
    BaseBoundary
    Base class for console UI boundaries providing common input/output helpers and a reference to the AuthController when available.
    BaseController
    Base class for controllers providing shared repository access and common validation helpers.
    CareerCenterStaff
    Represents a Career Center Staff member who manages internship programs and company relationships.
    CareerCenterStaffBoundary
    Console boundary for Career Center staff operations.
    CareerCenterStaffController
    Controller for Career Center staff operations such as approving internships, managing company representative registrations and processing withdrawal requests.
    CareerCenterStaffRepository
    In-memory repository for managing CareerCenterStaff entities.
    CompanyRep
    Represents a Company Representative who manages internship postings and applications for their company.
    CompanyRep.RepPostingReadPort
    Read-port interface for querying posting information from persistence.
    CompanyRepBoundary
    Boundary handling console interactions for company representatives.
    CompanyRepController
    Controller for company representative actions (manage internships and applications for the rep's company).
    CompanyRepRegistrationBoundary
    Boundary responsible for signing up new company representatives.
    CompanyRepRegistrationController
    Controller handling registration and management of company representative accounts.
    CompanyRepRepository
    In-memory repository for managing CompanyRep entities.
    CrudRepository<T,ID>
    Minimal CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) repository contract used by in-memory repositories throughout the project.
    DataSaveController
    Controller responsible for loading and saving repository CSV files from/to the configured base data directory.
    Internship
    Represents an internship posting created by a company representative.
    InternshipApplication
    Represents a student's application to an internship, managing the complete application lifecycle.
    InternshipLevel
    Represents the experience level or complexity of an internship position.
    InternshipRepository
    In-memory repository for managing Internship entities.
    InternshipStatus
    Represents the approval and availability status of an internship posting.
    LoginBoundary
    Console boundary class handling interactive login flow for all user roles in the Internship Placement Management System.
    LoginBoundary.Role
    Enumeration representing the available user roles in the system.
    LoginBoundary.Session
    Represents an active authenticated session for a single user in the system.
    Main
    Main application entry point for the Internship Management System.
    MainMenuBoundary
    Main menu boundary class that serves as the entry point for the Internship Placement Management System.
    Student
    Represents a student user who can apply for internship positions.
    Student.AppReadPort
    Minimal read-only application view required by the domain layer.
    StudentBoundary
    Console boundary class for student-facing interactions in the internship management system.
    StudentController
    Controller exposing student-facing operations required by the UI boundaries.
    StudentRepository
    In-memory repository for managing Student entities.
    User
    Base user entity shared by students, company representatives, and career center staff.
    WithdrawalRequest
    Represents a student's request to withdraw from an internship application.
    WithdrawalRequestRepository
    In-memory repository for managing WithdrawalRequest entities.
    WithdrawalRequestStatus
    Represents the processing status of a withdrawal request submitted by a student.
